item.description: Our sprint triathlon training program kicks off on Saturday May 30th. You can register on our website in advance: www.bostonfit.net or onsite the morning of our first meeting. The program will meet on Wednesday evenings at Greater Boston Running Company in Lexington Center and Saturday mornings in a variety of locations over the course of the season. The first Saturay meeting will be at the Marsh Post in Cambridge on the Charles River. Wear your running shoes. No need for any other gear for the first meeting.

group.name: Boston Fit Marathon, Half Marathon, and Triathlon Training

item.name: Boston Fit Sprint triathlon training program, Kick Off/Week #1
